title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 7: Agility, Edge Control Simulation
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Enhance lateral force application, hip‑knee‑ankle synergy, and visual reaction.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Cone slalom (S‑patterns) 8–12 runs; emphasize inside‑edge knee drive
Strength (maint.): 3x4 Safety Bar Squat, 3x6 Bench Pull

notes: Week 1: Slalom ladder patterns + reaction lights. Week 2: tighter spacing & faster cadence.
